roleset.name: do work in a garden
roleset.note: GARDEN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'garden' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from garden.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: While she applauds the fact that [more Americans]-1 are getting up from the television *trace*-1 to stroll or garden, she says the percentage of Americans who do ``real exercise to build the heart'' is only 10% to 20%.

example.name: Arg0
example.text: Her gardening helped keep Maude active well into her 90s.
